form.name: introducing_complementary_foods_at_6_months
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding A Healthy Child > Introducing Complementary Foods At 6 Months

field.name: Introducing Complementary Foods at 6 Months | Counseling
Start at 6 months, your child needs other foods in addition to breastmilk
Continue breastfeeding your child on demand both day and night
Breastmilk continues to be the most important part of your child’s diet
Breastfeed first before giving other foods
